definition: to display one's remarkable skill or prowess/to give full play to one's brilliant abilities
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: By the evening of the 16th the subtle hand of Hurstwood had made itself apparent.
sentences.chinese: 到了16日晚上，赫斯渥已經巧妙地大顯神通。

sentences.english: This engineer showed his magic power in his work.
sentences.chinese: 在工作中，這位工程師大顯神通。
